p: In addition, the fraction of future distribution covered by the system of PA in Chile was estimated. All categories offering some level of protection were considered: national parks, national reserves, biosphere parks, national monuments, national patrimony, and private PA as of 2011. RAMSAR sites (as of 2012) were also included as they constitute the most important feeding grounds for guanaco in the hyper-arid north of Chile ( Squeo et al., 2006).
